ModMetaData.name: Civilization Beyond Earth Armor Sets
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul,ParaNautic(chrissmooth25)
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Civilization Beyond Earth armor From the Soldier Tree
[h1]Features:[/h1] - New Tech Tree - Tier 1 Soldier Suit Set - Tier 2 Soldier Armor Set - Tier 3 Harmony Armor Set - Tier 3 Supremacy Armor Set - Tier 3 Purity Armor Set - Tier 4 Purity Armor Set - Tier 4 Supremacy Armor Set - Tier 4 Hybrid Armor Set (Eidolon) - Helemt and Suit in 6 difference colors : Red,Blue,Green,Purple,Orange,Yellow. - Helemt and Suit in 5 difference Camos : Winter,Navy,Desert,Desert,Woodland,Stealth - Tier 2,3,4 Purity Helemt and Armor in 6 difference colors : Red,Blue,Green,Purple,Orange,Yellow.
Commissioned by "JangoD'soul" for "ParaNautic(chrissmooth25)#7464" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -Civilization Beyond Earth -JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder -Harkon- Combat Extended patch
[url=https://discord.com/invite/7befJWr9xS][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
